frame.name: Medical_specialties
frame.definition: <def-root>This frame includes words that name medical specialties and is closely related to the Medical_professionals frame. The FE <fen>Type</fen> characterizing a sub-are in a <fen>Specialty</fen> may also be expressed. <ex>Ralph <gov>practices</gov> <x><fex name="Type">paediatric</fex> <fex name="Spec"><t>oncology</t></fex></x>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Specialty
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the medical <fen>Specialty</fen> that someone practices.
<ex>Ralph <gov>practices</gov> <x><t>paediatric</t> <fex name="Spec"><t>oncology</t></fex></x>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Type</fen> of medical <fen>Specialty</fen> . <ex>Ralph <gov>practices</gov> <x><fex name="Type">paediatric</fex> <t>oncology</t></x>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Body_system
FE.definition:
<def-root>The sub-part or sub-system of the body which is studied. This is normally incorporated in the LUs of the frame.
<ex>Dr. Steppenhame was a specialist in <fex name="bod">intestinal</fex> <t>epidemiology</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Affliction
FE.definition:
<def-root>The disease or disorder that a specialist attempts to treat. This concept is normally incorporated in the name of the <fen>Specialty</fen>.
<ex>She briefly worked as <fex name="aff">diabetic</fex> <t>endocrinology</t> intern.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: cardiologie.n
lexUnit.definition: dat zich bezighoudt met hart en bloedvaten

lexUnit.name: homeopathie.n
lexUnit.definition: waarbij je als geneesmiddel juist die stof gebruikt die de ziekte veroorzaakt
